subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The news that the N.C.A.A. did not find any major violations after investigating reported irregularities at Auburn did not come as a surprise to Jim Gundlach. A former professor at Auburn, Gundlach told The New York Times in 2006 about Auburn’s use of directed-reading courses, which resemble independent study but include core subjects that usually require class instruction.
